item.description:
“The Absolut Squeeze” Elegant Garden Brunch

 The Tower Hill Botanic Garden, Boylston, MA

The garden atmosphere will be festive, sophisticated, and inviting. David Zox, a world class Bassist, played with Al Vega, Glen Miller Artie Shaw, and Shelia Jordan has invited a pianist and trumpet player / vocalist to join him in providing us a terrific listening experience. Our menu includes a choice of either a made to order Omelet including ham, sausage, bacon, turkey, shrimp, onions, peppers, spinach, mushrooms, tomatoes, broccoli and cheddar cheese or help yourself to a self-serve Waffle station with a choice of blueberry, pineapple, apple or cherry compote, fresh strawberries, whipped cream, chocolate chips and of course maple syrup and butter. Complement your Absolut Squeeze with coffee or tea. Walk around many different gardens with a cocktail and then enjoy a gourmet dessert, mini bagels, muffins, scones, cinnamon rolls and Danish. Anyone interested in garden design and horticulture will enjoy this event.

You will arrive at The Tower Hill Botanic Garden, Stoddard Center and receive a ticket for brunch. We will have a private room in the Stoddard Center for serving food and drinks. Take your food and cocktails outside and tour several gardens while listening to The David Zox Trio. Join your friends for multiple garden walks interspersed by isolated conversation places. Dress is sport casual. Jackets for men, summer dresses for women. Everyone is welcome to wear their favorite hat.

Visit the Tower Hill Botanic Garden web site to preview the gardens http://www.towerhillbg.org/

and directions. http://www.towerhillbg.org/index.php/visit/plan-your-visit/directions/

RSVP is required! Make the reservations for September 9th, 11 AM- 3PM.

Cost: Members and their guest(s) $45.00 by check payable to Sitzundjiber and mail to Ben Sabatini before August 28th. Paypal is NOT available for this event.

Price includes admission, ticket for omelet or waffle entree, coffee, tea, dessert, and music. Cash bar is available.



Free Parking.
item.name: The Annual "Absolute Squeeze" now open to Meetup members!
